question: What are the different ways to manage a state in a React application?
answer: This is one of most technical question for every react developer need to know about why we don't set the state directly in react. If we are directly set the state it has faced some of issues like state does not change immediately instead it's creates pending transition states. In time If we return the state value it should return previous value. and also has replaced setState if we update made. Basically we just loss the control of state of all components etc
